300.22 (F40.00)

situations:
1. Using public transportation (e.g., automobiles, buses, trains,
ships, planes).

bridges).
3. Being in enclosed places (e.g., shops, theaters, cinemas).
4. Standing in line or being in a crowd.
5. Being outside of the home alone.
